extendedInfo.description: Nothing would ever be the same again because the slaughterous and most destructive war in history has begun. The defenseless countries have crushed and outhitted and the countries in the saddle are still fighting. The proficient countries of the world are aggressively pushing the second-string countries aside. Among the six super powers emerged in this calamitous war, which country are you going to choose as a weapon to tear others countries apart?Start contending your base from the rivals and fight to become one of the tri-Pâs; i.e; powerful, prevalent, and paramount as you conquer and forge ahead to ultimate victory in The World War.FEATURES:- Bank - Bank will allow you to protect your cash from being looted, any cash present in your bank will be loot free.- Shield - Shield will save your cash and health from enemies as long as the shield is active. Opponents cannot damage you and they can not get any of your cash.- More countries - We are introducing two new countries for you. Now you have more enemies to battle against.- Notices - You will be notified regarding enhancements and promotions through notices present on your Home Screen- Allies - Add more friends to build a stronger army and ravish your enemies with increased power- Battle - You can play against real player from all around the world, try it out- Units - We have a wide range of army units for you to bring down the enemy. Units range from infantry to air units.- Earn cash - Use construction units to earn cash. Some units generate cash and some cost an upkeep value.- Events - We have some new and exciting events for you. Keep playing the game and soon you will entertained by these limited time events...and the list goes on and ON!!!
